column5: Hey guys,  I got a shimano calcutta and an abu record that I want to get some maintenance work on prior to working them hard this fall. I know Aikmens in Mississauga is good, but is there a place in Durham anyone can recommend? Thanks, Matt
Hey Matt I give mine to John @ Tightlines on Brock and he sends them in to Shimano to do the service. They usually take up to 3 weeks but the job is done A1. Good Luck.  Stan
I tried finding someone a month ago, Tightlines and Gagnonss send them to Aikmans in Mississauga and takes 3to 4 weeks to get it back. good luck
Thanks guys. Aikmens is going to get me them back in a few days, great service and very responsive. Its just a ways out of the way, so I was looking for something closer
